title: Strawberry Shortcake
headline: What A Treat!
summary: A dense sweet pound cake filled with a whole strawberry and topped with a whip cream frosting.  Your own mini strawberry shortcake cupcakes!
body: What better way to celebrate than with strawberry shortcake cupcakes? With a cakey cupcake base loaded with fresh strawberries and an oh-so-creamy strawberry buttercream, youâ€™ll have all the joys of a strawberry shortcake in neat little cupcake package.
